sentences.en: A deadly lassitude had taken hold of him.
Avoiding too much labour, preventing from pathogen, the chronic lassitude will be prevented. 3.
sentences.cn: 避免过劳, 防避邪气, 以更好地预防慢性腰肌劳损的发生.

sentences.en: Fatigue and lassitude are also early signs of sub - clinical deficiency of the vitamin.
sentences.cn: 疲倦和无力也是缺乏维生素C的早期临床症状.

sentences.en: Her courage was lowered to zero by her physical lassitude.
sentences.cn: 她由于身体疲乏,勇气降到零点.

sentences.en: Intoxicating earth aromas induced lassitude and ethereal calm.
sentences.cn: 泥土的醉人的芳香叫人懒洋洋的,感到一种远离尘世的宁静.

sentences.en: It was lassitude's apology to energy.
sentences.cn: 这是无精打采的人面对精力充沛的人找的托辞.

sentences.en: Lassitude occurs early in the course of the disease.
Objective : To find out work lassitude level of hospital nurses and its influencing factors.
sentences.cn: 了解医院护士的工作倦怠水平及其影响因素.

sentences.en: Sometimes we feel lassitude on a hot summer day.
sentences.cn: 我们在炎热的夏日有时感到倦怠.

sentences.en: Symptoms of anaemia include general fatigue and lassitude.
sentences.cn: 贫血症状包括全身疲劳和困乏。

sentences.en: With all my lassitude I have strength enough to see it out.
sentences.cn: 尽管我那么困倦,我有足够看到结果的力气.

trans.tran_en: tiredness and lack of energy or interest
